articles.title: First 'Trooping the Colour' parade for Britain's King Charles - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's King Charles celebrated his first official birthday parade as sovereign on Saturday, riding on horseback to inspect soldiers in a ceremony that has been an annual event since 1760.
